responses: Dig fiercely at the mossy ground, searching for hidden riches beneath.
Quickly carve into the thick oak roots, searching for concealed valuables or secret passages.

tiles.description: The tile at (0, 0) features a secluded, moss-covered clearing encircled by ancient, towering oaks whose gnarled roots weave through a carpet of vibrant wildflowers, hinting at hidden treasures beneath the soil.
